text: | void insertNum(nodeType* &first, int num){ nodeType *current, *newNode, *prior; if (first = NULL){ // insert into empty list first = new nodeType; first->info = num; first->link = NULL; ) else( if (first->info > num){ // insert at top of list newNode = new nodeType; newNode->info = num; newNode->link = first; first=newNode; ) else( int done = 0; current = first; while((current != NULL)&&(!done)) { if (current->info > num){ // insert between 2 nodes newNode = new nodeType; newNode->info = num; newNode->link = current; prior->link = newNode; done = 1; ) else( prior = current; current = current->link; 짜 ) if(ldone){ // insert at end of list newNode = new nodeType; newNode->info = num; newNode->link = current; prior->link = newNode; 짜 짜 짜 1
